product_name: SteriPEN Water Purification System Set - 2014 Closeout
long_description: Carry this set to ensure safe drinking water for travel, outdoor recreation and emergency situations. Includes a handheld UV water purifier, SteriPEN pre-filter, water bottle and 4 AA batteries.
short_description: Carry this set to ensure safe drinking water for travel, outdoor recreation and emergency situations. Includes a handheld UV water purifier, SteriPEN pre-filter, water bottle and 4 AA batteries.
